infos.value: Selection Quests have quite rigid restrictions. As such, there are rewards that can be obtained only here.
Unexpected members may play an important role, so I hope you will give it a try.

• Selection Quests •
This is a Quest that is challenged by selecting suitable units based on the Embark Restrictions.

• Embark Restrictions •
There are various Embark Restrictions such as unit element and rarity.

• Training •
Claiming victory will require the training of various units.

• Rewards •
Fabulous rewards can be obtained by clearing these Quests.
Proceed to a tutorial on Dummy?
